channel.title: Manihot Esculenta on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Manihot Esculenta on funPlantGenes

item.title: MeABA1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Manes.10G150700 Gene Symbol: MeABA1 Gene Name: ABA DEFICIENT 1 Genome: high-quality genome sequence Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: The intron retention transcript of MeABA1 (ABA DEFICIENT 1) was highly correlated with PPD symptoms in cassava storage roots.

item.title: MeASMT1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Manes.13G140900 Gene Symbol: MeASMT1 Gene Name: N-aceylserotonin O-methyltransferase 1 Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: Melatonin synthesis genes N-aceylserotonin O-methyltransferase 1 (MeASMT1) expression and antiviral response.

item.title: MeCAD15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MeCAD15 Gene Name: cinnamyl alcohol dehydrogenase 15 Genome: cassava database of Phytozome v10.

item.title: MeCAT6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Manes.01G154400 Gene Symbol: MeCAT6 Gene Name: catalases 6 Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: Antioxidant gene catalases 6 (MeCAT6) expression and antiviral response.

item.title: MeCAT7
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Manes.02G113300 Gene Symbol: MeCAT7 Gene Name: catalases 7 Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: Antioxidant gene catalases 7 (MeCAT7) expression and antiviral response.

item.title: MeCatalase1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Me.05G130500 Gene Symbol: MeCatalase1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: The chaperone MeHSP90 recruits MeWRKY20 and MeCatalase1 to regulate drought stress resistance in cassava.

item.title: MeCGTR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Manes.17G021100 Gene Symbol: MeCGTR1 Gene Name: Genome: Manihot esculenta, v8.

item.title: MeGRXC3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Manes.01G215000 Gene Symbol: MeGRXC3 Gene Name: Genome: Manihot esculenta v8.

item.title: MeHB16
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MeHB16 Gene Name: homeodomain leucine-zipper I (HD-Zip I) TF Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: KIN10-mediated HB16 protein phosphorylation and self-association improve cassava disease resistance by transcriptional activation of lignin biosynthesis genes.

item.title: MeHDZ14
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Manes.01G242300 Gene Symbol: MeHDZ14 Gene Name: Genome: Manihot esculenta, v8.

item.title: MeHSP90.9
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Me18G012200 Gene Symbol: MeHSP90.9 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: This study highlights the dual regulation of SA and auxin biosynthesis by MeHSP90.

item.title: MeKIN10
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MeKIN10 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: KIN10-mediated HB16 protein phosphorylation and self-association improve cassava disease resistance by transcriptional activation of lignin biosynthesis genes.

item.title: MeMYB2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MeMYB2 Gene Name: Genome: Manihot esculenta, v6.

item.title: MeNF-YC15
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MeNF-YC15 Gene Name: nuclear factor Y Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: NF-YC15 transcription factor activates ethylene biosynthesis and improves cassava disease resistance.

item.title: MeNR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Me.S077300.1 Gene Symbol: MeNR1 Gene Name: Nitrate reductase 1 Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: Investigated the role of MeCatalase1 and MeRAV5-MeNR1/2 module in cassava defence response.

item.title: MeNR2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Me.S076800.1 Gene Symbol: MeNR2 Gene Name: Nitrate reductase 2 Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: Investigated the role of MeCatalase1 and MeRAV5-MeNR1/2 module in cassava defence response.

item.title: MePIP2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MePIP2|7 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: Found that the cassava aquaporin MePIP2|7|MePIP2|7 was involved in Mg2+ transport through interaction with MeMGT9, a lower affinity magnesium transporter protein.

item.title: MePOD
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: MePOD Gene Name: Genome: cassava database of Phytozome v10.

item.title: MePSY3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: cassava32745 Gene Symbol: MePSY3 Gene Name: phytoene synthase3 Genome: cassava genome assembly version 1.

item.title: MeRAV5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Me.06G036900 Gene Symbol: MeRAV5 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: The dual interplay of RAV5 (MeRAV5) in activating nitrate reductases and repressing catalase activity to improve disease resistance in cassava.

item.title: MeRAV5
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Me.06G036900 Gene Symbol: MeRAV5 Gene Name: Genome: cassava database of Phytozome v10.

item.title: MeSCL33
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Manes.09G040200 Gene Symbol: MeSCL33 Gene Name: SC35-like splicing factor 33 Genome: high-quality genome sequence Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: RNA yeast 3-hybrid and RNA immunoprecipitation (RIP) assays showed that the serine/arginine-rich protein MeSCL33 (SC35-like splicing factor 33) binds to the precursor mRNA of MeABA1.

item.title: MeT5H
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Manes.06G111700 Gene Symbol: MeT5H Gene Name: tryptamine 5-hydroxylase Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: Melatonin synthesis genes tryptamine 5-hydroxylase (MeT5H) expression and antiviral response.

item.title: MeWRKY20
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Me.15G118300 Gene Symbol: MeWRKY20 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Manihot esculenta Functional Descriptions: The chaperone MeHSP90 recruits MeWRKY20 and MeCatalase1 to regulate drought stress resistance in cassava.
